description: This is a portable games console in working condition, with a backlit screen allowing you to play in the dark. Multiple game systems can be linked together for multiplayer games.

name: miscipula brachiumorphus
description: Your own overgrown arm, massive head like a venus fly trap angrily frothing and lashing at anything that moves. You included, occasionally.

use_action.done_message: Your arm lithely rips a huge chunk of dirt out of the earth, swallowing it whole.

description: One of the single most popular items of the pre-apocalypse, this magic bottle contains everything one might need to clean up after themselves. Spray it on your face, you're shaved. Spray it on a mess, it's gone. Only needs soap and water to do so.

name: Leap
description: You leap, perhaps across a gap or forward through a crowd of zombies. Whatever the case, you push your body to move quickly. Say no if asked if you'd like to step into ledge, one time required for each ledge in the gap.

name: Leap
description: You leap, perhaps across a gap or forward through a crowd of zombies. Whatever the case, you push your body to move quickly. Say no if asked if you'd like to step into ledge, one time required for each ledge in the gap.
You feel an insatiable need to move.
You feel an insatiable need to move.

name: wings
description: An instrument used to fly, incorporeal but appearing however the caster wishes. Whatever it is, they're only semi-potent in that you can stop your falls and flutter up short distances, but you cannot fly directly up without some form of supporting wall. By activating them a skilled wizard can leap a huge distance.

name: Jump
description: You make a death-defying leap.

name: Ascend
description: You

You have some way or form of slowing your descent magically. This could manifest as an incorporeal set of bird wings, a jetpack or anything else a wizard's mind can muster. One thing stays the same: you can't go up.

You have some way or form of slowing your descent magically. This could manifest as an incorporeal set of bird wings, a jetpack or anything else a wizard's mind can muster. One thing stays the same: you can't go up.

name: Thermal Ignorance
description: Your mind is addled, but for some reason the heat isn't affecting you.
Heat has no effect on you.
A bubble that has formed around the caster to protect them. At casting, the caster can also choose to have this bubble appear as gills on their body or some other apparatus that has the same effect.
Your swimming is magically enhanced. You hate being in water much less, you swim faster when you aren't wearing footwear and you can breathe underwater.
You have *it*.
You are particularly beautiful, almost strangely so. People who care will find you more attractive, but most people consider you a non-threat or a stranger.
You feel more inwardly focused and resistant to outside stimuli.
You feel more inwardly focused while still maintaining your connection to the world around you.
LIKE A TONKA TRUCK.
Your magic has been silenced.
Your magic has been suppressed.
Your heart is colored with magic, bonding the two forever.
Your mind is the color of magic, the two now inseperably intertwined.
Your soul is magic, and magic is your soul.
Your steps are greatly muffled
A large, spotted black egg that shakes and quivers at the slightest provocation. With even the tiniest prod, it may open...

name: Happy Birthday
description: The egg opens and inside you find...
A small pendant that, when opened, will enthrall a creature's mind for a short period of time.
A charm made of pure manipulation. Activate it to stir hearts and minds.
Dust that, when sprinkled over the head, greatly increases comprehension.
Dust that, when sprinkled over the head, greatly increases comprehension.
Dust that, when sprinkled over the head, greatly increases comprehension.

name: yourself into yourself
description: Fast reader aura

name: yourself into yourself
description: Fast reader aura

name: yourself into yourself
description: Fast reader aura
You feel much smarter in general.
You feel much smarter in general.
You feel much smarter in general.
You've gathered your strength, for now.

A skull you don't remember picking up, but it's on your head anyway. Two red streaks fall from either eye, and you can feel a dark magic radiating off of it. Somehow you know that if this skull comes in contact with a magic circle, magic boulder, or other such item of magical importance, an altar in worship to malice will grow in it's place.
A platinum necklace, with a small, empty heart-shaped frame hanging from a chain... It has a fractal burn down it's length like it was struck by lightning.

An old-fashioned copper bracelet with a miniature orrery attached to it, the orrery spinning with undeserved momentum. A skilled mage can adjust the orrery in such a way to manipulate space in the real world.
An orrery of the solar system bound by a chain of shining platinum, slowly spinning around a pale golden light trapped within. The wearer holds the key to space/time.
The world becomes a blur, and you beginning violently teleporting.
A discreet object that stuns hostiles in a radius around you.
You are magically more resistant to cold.
You are magically more resistant to heat.
You are magically more resistant to electric.
You are magically more resistant to biological damage.
You are magically more resistant to bashing, stabbing and cutting.

The M249 is a mountable machine gun used by the US military and SWAT teams.  Quite inaccurate and difficult to control, the M249 is designed to fire many rounds very quickly. This one can turn into a tiny silver token and back again at your command. Any ammunition or mods on or in the gun when this happens are wasted.

use_action.msg: You say the command word engraved on the machine gun, and it rapidly shrinks and morphs into a shiny silver token!

name: pocket saw token
description: A large silver coin that, when activated by uttering the word on the back, turns into the item pictured on the front, in this case an m249 saw.

use_action.msg: You say the command word engraved on the token, and it rapidly grows and morphs into a shiny new machine gun!

description: A ridiculously light and useful modification for use with any pistol. Will improve nearly every aspect of the gun's performance. Similar to a carbine chassis, forged of either silver or gold roughly into the form of a wolf. Once it's on, it's on.
A field that keeps you safe from bullets.
A field that is keeping you tethered to the physical realm while simultaneously changing your position in it.
A huge duffel-bag sized hat.  Provides plenty of storage, and flows with your movement. It is not encumbering in the slightest.

pocket_data.//: items slipped under the top of a duffelbag not well secured

description: Pure white and warm as the sunrise, this dancing ball of energy contains what used to make someone, someone.
Pure white and warm as the sunrise, this dancing ball of energy contains what used to make someone, someone. Use it to learn the location of nearby banks.

use_action.message: You suddenly remember where the nearest banks are.
